commentBody: The $1mm fine he paid probably saved him tens of millions of dollars given the current state of riverboat gambling sites. Anyway, DeBartolo was a beloved owner who took care of his players. Today, the NFL owners throw their assets (players) to the wolves. Had DeBartolo stayed in the game, today's players who only last a few years due to injury would be better protected and have an insurance policy to help them through their injuries.
